entry.name: Email_Critical_System_Logs
entry.description: Email Critical System Logs

entry.name: Daily Malicious URL Cats
entry.caption: Daily Malicious URL Cats
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)
entry.description: Hosts visiting C&C, Malware, Hacking or Phishing URL Categoris

entry.name: Weekly Malicious URL Cats
entry.caption: Weekly Malicious URL Cats
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)
entry.description: Hosts visiting C&C, Malware, Hacking or Phishing URL Categoris

entry.name: Daily Potential URL Cats
entry.caption: Daily Potential URL Cats
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Hosts visiting Dynamic-DNS, Parked, Unknown URL Categories

entry.name: Weekly Potential URL Cats
entry.caption: Weekly Potential URL Cats
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Hosts visiting Dynamic-DNS, Parked, Unknown URL Categories

entry.name: Clients sinkholed Daily
entry.caption: Clients sinkholed Daily
entry.description: Clients doing malicious DNS domain lookups

entry.name: Clients sinkholed Trending
entry.caption: Clients sinkholed Trending
entry.description: Clients doing malicious DNS domain lookups

entry.name: Highest Vol Rules by Sessions
entry.caption: Highest Vol Rules by Sessions
entry.description: Monthly Operational Report: Rule Usage by Session
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Least Vol Rules by Bytes
entry.caption: Least Vol Rules by Bytes
entry.description: Monthly Operational Report: Least Volume Rules by Bytes (experimental)
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (bytes leq 10000)

entry.name: Highest Vol Rules by Bytes
entry.caption: Highest Vol Rules by Bytes
entry.description: Monthly Operational Report: Most Volume Rules by Bytes (experimental)
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Daily In Allowed Threats
entry.caption: Daily In Allowed Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats allow into your network from the Internet (geq medium)

entry.name: Weekly In Allowed Threats
entry.caption: Weekly In Allowed Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats allow into your network from the Internet (geq medium)

entry.name: Daily Int Allowed Threats
entry.caption: Daily Int Allowed Threats
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (threat-type eq wildfire-virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats successfully allowed FROM your network TO your network (lateral movement). (medium and higher)

entry.name: Weekly Int Allowed Threats
entry.caption: Weekly Int Allowed Threats
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (threat-type eq wildfire-virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats successfully allowed FROM your network TO your network (lateral movement). (medium and higher)

entry.name: Daily Out Allowed Threats
entry.caption: Daily Out Allowed Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats leaving your network successfully (medium and higher)

entry.name: Weekly Out Allowed Threats
entry.caption: Weekly Out Allowed Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats leaving your network successfully (medium and higher)

entry.name: Daily Out Denied Threats
entry.caption: Daily Out Denied Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats successfully denied from leaving your network (medium and higher)

entry.name: Daily Int Denied Threats
entry.caption: Daily Int Denied Threats
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (threat-type eq wildfire-virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats successfully denied FROM your network TO network (medium and higher)

entry.name: Weekly Int Denied Threats
entry.caption: Weekly Int Denied Threats
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (threat-type eq wildfire-virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats successfully denied FROM your network TO our network (medium and higher)

entry.name: Weekly In Denied Threats
entry.caption: Weekly In Denied Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats attempting but failing to access your network (medium and higher)

entry.name: Weekly Out Denied Threats
entry.caption: Weekly Out Denied Threats
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((threat-type eq virus) or (((threat-type eq spyware) or (threat-type eq vulnerability)) and (severity geq medium)))
entry.description: Threats successfully denied from leaving your network (medium and higher)

entry.name: title
entry.value: Weekly Trending Potential Compromise Enterprise Reports

system.login-banner: You have accessed a protected system. Log off immediately if you are not an authorized user.

entry.name: Outbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with destination address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: Inbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with source address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: DNS Sinkhole Block
entry.description: Block outbound sessions that match a malicious domain and have been redirected to a configured sinkhole IP address.

entry.name: Outbound Bogon Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with a destination address matching a known bogon address that should not be transitting the firewall. Add known exceptions to the rule before activating.

entry.name: Inbound Bogon Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with a source address matching a known bogon address that should not be transitting the firewall. Add known exceptions to the rule before activating.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt URL Categories
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt Rule
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

entry.name: iron-skillet-version
entry.comments: version 1.0.3: version of this iron-skillet template file

ip.description: IPv4 addresses that should not be routed across the Internet. Either reserved IP address space or unassigned and may be used for malicious purposes. More information: http://www.team-cymru.com/bogon-reference.html

IPv6 addresses that should not be routed across the Internet. Either reserved IP address space or unassigned and may be used for malicious purposes. More information: http://www.team-cymru.com/bogon-reference.html

entry.name: Exception-AV
entry.description: Use this profile for rules needing modifications to the standard
